cleaned_text: Meditation - Aromatic Mist 3 Reviews $ 7.95 This aromatic mist contains pure essential oils to enliven the atmosphere of any room, refresh linens or balance your living environment in a safe, healthy way. Meditation - Patchouli is grounding and balancing while Frankincense has been used in spiritual settings for over 3,000 years. Together they are meditative and mystical. DIRECTIONS: Shake well before using. Mist high into the air, away from your face, as needed to enhance any room. CAUTION: Contains natural oils that may stain some linens. Please test first. Contents flammable. Keep away from flames. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children.
